source:
%%sql

-- Create view for HR Organization Unit in Synapse
CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW odw_curated_db.vw_dim_HR_Organisation_Unit AS
WITH RankedData AS (
    SELECT 
        Orgunit AS OrganisationUnitCode,
        OrganizationalUnit AS OrganisationUnitDesc,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY Orgunit ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC) AS Rnk
    FROM odw_harmonised_db.hist_sap_hr
    WHERE Report_MonthEnd_Date = (SELECT MAX(Report_MonthEnd_Date) FROM odw_harmonised_db.hist_sap_hr)
    GROUP BY Orgunit, OrganizationalUnit, Report_MonthEnd_Date
),
DistinctUnits AS (
    SELECT DISTINCT
        OrganisationUnitCode,
        OrganisationUnitDesc
    FROM RankedData
    WHERE Rnk = 1
)
SELECT
    RANK() OVER(ORDER BY OrganisationUnitCode) AS dim_organisation_key,
    OrganisationUnitCode,
    OrganisationUnitDesc
FROM DistinctUnits

%%sql
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS odw_curated_db.pbi_dim_HR_Organisation_Unit
USING delta
AS
SELECT * FROM odw_curated_db.vw_dim_HR_Organisation_Unit
